hypothesis: Pre-training OFFLINE on 10K+ simulations creates a fixed surrogate that works with parallel processing.

tuning_runs.notes: Tested RMSE landscape correlation across 5 samples. Average Spearman r = -0.167. Many pairs negatively correlated. RMSE landscape is completely sample-specific.

final_result: ABORTED - RMSE landscape is sample-specific (kappa, bc, Y_observed vary). Average correlation -0.167 across samples. Universal surrogate cannot predict RMSE without sample information.
